s: July 5, 2023 - Now publishing over 100 books a year, Oneworld has retained its founding commitment to the old-fashioned principles of great writing, editorial excellence, high production values, and marketing flair, to produce books that are read by the intellectually curious all over the world.

May 6, 2022 - Submission Guidelines Fiction Thank you for thinking of Oneworld. Sadly, we are unable to accept any author submissions for fiction at present, whether that be Children’s, YA or fiction for adults. We hope that this will change in the not-too-distant future.
